statements: UPDATE firmware_updates SET deployed_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET version = 'v2.0.1' WHERE device_id = 3;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET version='1.2.1', deployed_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, update_url='https://example.com/update1' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET deployed_at='2022-05-20 10:30:00', version='1.3', update_url='https://example.com/update2' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET release_date = '2022-01-10' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET manufacturer = 'Samsung', device_name = 'Galaxy S20' WHERE device_id = '5ecaa905-1c02-4c47-9613-9a2b4d3cea5d';
UPDATE firmware_updates SET version = 2, release_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE devices SET device_name = 'New Device Name', manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer', last_update_id = 2 WHERE device_id = '43c2175d-579c-4cbf-9954-2b414e285b2e'
UPDATE Device SET device_name = 'New Device Name' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE Firmware SET firmware_version = 'v2.0' WHERE firmware_id = 2;
UPDATE Device SET device_name='New Device Name', device_model='New Device Model' WHERE device_id=123;
UPDATE Firmware SET firmware_version='2.0', firmware_file=LOAD_FILE('/path/to/new_firmware_file.bin') WHERE firmware_id=456;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET version = 'v2.0', update_data = '{"patch":"Bug fixes"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET last_updated = '2022-02-15 12:00:00', firmware_version = 'v1.5' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET version = '1.2.3', update_data = '{"description": "Bug fixes and performance improvements"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, firmware_version = 'v2.0', device_name = 'New Device' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET version = 'v2.0', file_path = '/path/to/new/file' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET device_type = 'Mobile', os_version = 'iOS 14.5' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE firmware_updates SET version = '1.2.0', file_path = '/firmware/updates/update1.bin' WHERE device_id = 123;
UPDATE devices SET os_version = 'iOS 14.5', device_type = 'Smartphone' WHERE id = 456;
